00113 inline FeatureVector FeatureVector::operator+ (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00114 {
00115     // Check if vectors have the same size
00116     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00117         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator+() : Size of vectors to sum must be equal");
00118 
00119     FeatureVector temp(this->size_);
00120 
00121     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00122         temp.features_.at(i) = this->features_.at(i) + featureVector.features_.at(i);
00123 
00124     return temp;
00125 };

00128 inline FeatureVector FeatureVector::operator- (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00129 {
00130     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00131         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator-() : Size of vectors to subtract must be equal");
00132 
00133     FeatureVector temp(this->size_);
00134 
00135     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00136         temp.features_.at(i) = this->features_.at(i) - featureVector.features_.at(i);
00137 
00138     return temp;
00139 };

00142 inline double FeatureVector::operator* (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00143 {
00144     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00145         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator*() : Size of vectors to multiply must be equal");
00146 
00147     double result = 0.0;
00148 
00149     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00150         result += this->features_.at(i) * featureVector.features_.at(i);
00151 
00152     return result;
00153 };
